pain_points.description: Website and digital presence are outdated and unappealing.
supporting_quotes: I just find it to be really drab.
The photography is boring. The fonts are boring. The colors are boring.
It's just very stale and old-fashioned compared to anything.
pain_points.frequency_severity: High - frequently mentioned with strong dissatisfaction.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users navigate despite the drab design, but it's not user-friendly.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Users feel the website does not reflect the upscale nature of the club, which may deter potential members.

pain_points.description: Complexity in contacting members through the app.
supporting_quotes: I wish there was a way to just either press the email address of a person or press the phone number of a person and have it go through.
Instead, I find myself having to copy it or add it as a contact and write down the phone number and type it back in again.
pain_points.frequency_severity: Moderate - mentioned with frustration about inefficiency.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users manually copy and paste or write down contact details.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Increases time and effort required to communicate, leading to frustration.

pain_points.description: Difficult navigation to join the club on the website.
supporting_quotes: I'm not logged in. How do I become a member?
I never noticed it, but there's a Join Us button. Nope. It doesn't tell you anything about us.
pain_points.frequency_severity: Moderate - mentioned with confusion about the membership process.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Users may search for FAQs or ask others for help.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Potential members may abandon the process if it's not straightforward.

pain_points.description: Lack of a community forum for recommendations and support.
supporting_quotes: If there were some closed forum that was like that would be a huge help to current members.
I wish that there was even a member event where they, or part of new member orientation that would include how to get your driver's license.
pain_points.frequency_severity: Moderate - expressed as a wish for improvement.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Members rely on informal networks or social media.
pain_points.impact_on_user: New members feel isolated and unsupported in navigating local resources.

pain_points.description: Permitting process for home projects can be lengthy and frustrating.
supporting_quotes: We're going through the permitting process to do a little bit more work.
I think that the biggest thing that makes jobs go awry is when the materials aren't there.
pain_points.frequency_severity: Low - mentioned more as an observation rather than a primary frustration.
pain_points.current_workarounds: Planning and preparing materials ahead of time.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Delays in home improvement projects can lead to dissatisfaction.
